data.title: PolandWeekly
data.meta_description: Poland Weekly â€“ business, people and culture. Poland Weekly is a new media project that provides information and insights about Poland to the foreigners. Weekly newspaper distributed and sales in and outside Poland, portal and original video programmes aim to keep the international community up to date with economic and business situation in Poland but also introduce information about culture, society and lifestyle.
